start.text: It's time to kick ass and chew bubble gum.

start_boss.text: Now this will be a real challenge!

retreat.text: Ah come on! I haven't got all the fun yet.

engaged.text: Guns, check! Engine, check! Enemies to shoot, check!

need_help.text: I'm outnumbered, commander. Which is PERFECT! Power all the weapons!

hull_90.text: Nothing happened here! What? Hull breach?
Ugh, I'm shot and I don't like it!

hull_50.text: The other half won't be so easy!

hull_30.text: I'm in hyper-tension! Not the disease, you know.
Now this is interesting! Hey, someone turn that siren off.

overload.text: Fix that flux system already! I can't get the guns shooting!

death.text: Darn! I thought I could make it.

victory.text: Is it all you've got there!
